snippet: LEAD: Rate payers may have to absorb up to $4.5 billion of the $5.5 billion cost of building the Diablo Canyon nuclear power plant under a plan that was approved today by the California Public Utilties Commission and immediately attacked by consum...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Rate payers may have to absorb up to $4.5 billion of the $5.5 billion cost of building the Diablo Canyon nuclear power plant under a plan that was approved today by the California Public Utilties Commission and immediately attacked by consumer groups.

headline.main: Rate Plan Approved At Diablo Canyon Unit
